TopicTitle: Using Airplane Plus Helicopter Engine with Throttle Controlled Avionics

Articles.Content:
Greeting Kerbonauts,

Does anyone have info or the knowledge on how to get the Airplane Plus helicopter engines to work with TCA? I know they don't work like the normal engines so TCA doesn't see them. Does anyone know how to edit the files Airplane Plus files so TCA can work with them? Or does anyone know of helicopter engine mods that work with TCA? Many thanks. 

-Gibby
